data.name: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2: Cinna's Sketchbook: Secrets Of The Mockingjay Armor
data.detailed_description: Costume Designers Kurt & Bart created not only the majestic Mockingjay battle armor for Katniss, but also a beautiful prop Cinna sketchbook used on film. Here, we present high-resolution pages from the sketchbook accompanied by insightful audio commentary that illuminates the artistry involved.
